function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Regulated customer numbers in shops may lead to long queues outside, increasing the risk of close contact and transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to prolonged close contact in queues outside shops.","Mitigation":"Implement online reservation systems, virtual queuing, or staggered entry times to minimize congestion and prolonged close contact outside shops.","Technologies":"Virtual queuing apps, reservation systems, crowd management software.","People":"Customers, shop staff, local community.","Owner":"Shop owners, local government, technology providers."},{"Description":"Narrow supermarket aisles make it difficult for shoppers to maintain social distancing, increasing the risk of infection while passing in the aisles.","Impact":"Increased risk of infection due to close contact in narrow supermarket aisles.","Mitigation":"Implement one-way aisle systems, designate specific entry and exit points for aisles, and provide clear signage to guide shoppers.","Technologies":"Aisle management software, automated entry/exit systems, digital signage.","People":"Shoppers, supermarket staff.","Owner":"Supermarket management, technology providers."},{"Description":"Risk of infection in public transport due to limited air circulation and seating density, leading to prolonged exposure in confined environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to prolonged exposure in confined public transport.","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems, limit seating density, and enforce face mask usage on public transport.","Technologies":"Ventilation upgrades, occupancy detection sensors, air filtration systems.","People":"Commute passengers, transport operators, general public.","Owner":"Transport authorities, public health agencies, technology providers."}]}
